reaction.ranaway/3: Vrať se a bojuj jako chlap!
reaction.ranaway/4: Jestli tě ještě uvidím, praštím tě!
reaction.ranaway/5: Věděl jsem, že se mě bojíš!
reaction.ranaway/6: Proč utíkáš? Vrať se sem, abych tě mohl praštit!
reaction.ranaway/7: Praštím tě, jestli tě ještě uvidím!
reaction.ranaway/8: Vezmu své přátele a zmlátím tě!
villager.warning/1: I'm warning you, don't attack our people!
villager.hurt/6: Ahoj! Co si myslíš, že děláš?!
villager.badly_hurt/4: They're going to kill me! Someone help!
villager.badly_hurt/5: You can take whatever you want, just please don't hurt me!
villager.badly_hurt/6: I don't want to die! Stay away!
villager.sickness/1: I don't feel so well, doc...
villager.sickness/4: I-I think I might throw up
villager.sickness/6: I this... Father? Is that you?
villager.sickness/8: Please let this be a dream... *cough*

child.gift.saturated/1: I already have enough of these!
childp.gift.saturated/1: I already have enough of these!
spouse.gift.saturated/1: Darling, we have enough of that!
spouse.chore.mining.nopick: I forgot my pickaxe, dear, did you bring an extra one?

spouse.chore.fishing.norod: I'd love to! But, I can't find my fishing rod.
spouse.chore.hunting.nosword: I broke my sword yesterday. Do you have another one?
spouse.chore.harvesting.nohoe: Do you have an extra hoe I could use?

child.chore.harvesting.nohoe: Nemám motyku, se které bych sklízel.
adult.chore.mining.orenotify: Něco jsem našel! V okolí je nějaké %2$s.
adult.chore.harvesting.nohoe: Nemám motyku, se které bych sklízel.
child.interaction.marry.fail.isbaby: Snažíš se oženit s dítětem... Co?
spouse.interaction.marry.fail.marriedtog: Je to pěkný prsten, ale já už jsem za tebe vdaná, hlupáčku.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.marriedtoot: Je mi líto, ne... Já už jsem vdaná.
Myslel jsem, že víš... Už jsem s někým vdaná.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.playermarri: Hm... Vidím ten prsten na tvém prstě. Ty už jsi ženatý!
O co se to snažíte? Ty už jsi ženatý!
Co? Vážně? Myslím, že jsi vdaná za někoho jiného, že?
adult.interaction.marry.fail.lowhearts/2: Oh, pěkný prsten! Počkej... To je pro mě? mikrometr... Cha
adult.interaction.marry.fail.lowhearts/3: To je pro mě? Promiň, jen tě neznám dost.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.lowhearts/4: Lichotí mi to, ale ve skutečnosti tě neznám.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.isparent/3: Podle Encyklopedie života je incest nezákonný. Takže ne.
spouse.interaction.engage.success/1: Ano! Vezmu si tě! Miluji tě!
spouse.interaction.engage.success/3: Na čase... Dělám si legraci! Miluju tě!
spouse.interaction.engage.success/4: je... Je to skutečné? Chci říct, tahle chvíle, ne prsten. Ale ten prsten je skutečný, ne?
spouse.interaction.marry.success/1: Je to splněný sen! Budu tě navždy milovat!
spouse.interaction.marry.success/2: Konečně jsme se vzali! A teď co?
spouse.interaction.marry.success/3: Jsem rád, že jsem si tě vzal, %1$s.
spouse.interaction.marry.success/4: Nemůžu se dočkat, až spolu začneme žít!
adult.interaction.matchmaker.fail.marrie: Jsem šťastně ženatý, nechci dalšího manžela.
adult.interaction.matchmaker.fail.engage: Už jsem s někým zasnoubená, ten prsten si nemůžu vzít.
Slíbila jsem, že si vezmu někoho jiného.
Díky, ale myslím, že jsem v pořádku. Už jsem s někým zasnoubená.
adult.interaction.matchmaker.fail.needtw: Nepotřebuješ dva prsteny, abys zařídila svatbu?
Oh, dobře! Ale nejdřív potřebuješ dva prsteny.
Můj manžel a já budeme potřebovat prsten, ale ty máš jen jeden.
adult.interaction.matchmaker.fail.novill: Nevidím nikoho poblíž. Koho sis chtěl vzít?
Já prostě nevím... Posuňte mě blíž k tomu, o které si myslíte, že je pro mě ta pravá.
Oh, but there doesn't seem to be anyone close by. Who should I marry?
adult.interaction.sethome.success/1: Okay, this will be my new home point.
adult.interaction.sethome.success/2: I understand, I'll be sleeping here at night.
spouse.interaction.sethome.success/1: I really like this place, good job %1$s!
spouse.interaction.sethome.success/2: This is like a dream home!
childp.interaction.sethome.success/2: This is cool I guess. Can I go play now?
childp.interaction.sethome.success/3: Okay, but I want the biggest room!
interaction.sethome.fail/1: This doesn't look like a safe home point for me.
interaction.sethome.bedfail/1: Nice home, but all beds seem to be reserved.
interaction.sethome.bedfail.infirmary/1: This is a infirmary, the bed is reserved for sick people.
interaction.sethome.bedfail.blocked/1: This building has been marked as blocked.
adult.interaction.sethangout.success/1: This is my favorite spot. I'm often here in the evening.
child.interaction.sethangout.success/1: Okay fine! I will play here before bedtime.
childp.interaction.sethangout.success/1: Okay fine! I will play here before bedtime.
spouse.interaction.gohome.success/1: Sure, dear, I'll head home now.
child.interaction.gohome.success/1: Okay! I think I remember where I live...
spouse.interaction.gohome.fail.nohome: Remind me again where our house was?
child.interaction.gohome.fail.nohome: I don't remember where I live...
childp.interaction.gohome.fail.nohome: I don't remember where home is! We move too much!
child.interaction.ridehorse.fail.notnear: Where are the horses? I want to ride!
childp.interaction.ridehorse.fail.notnea: Where is my horse? I hope I didn't lose it again...
adult.interaction.ridehorse.fail.notnear: I don't see any rideable horses nearby.
spouse.interaction.ridehorse.fail.notnea: Where is my horse, dear? I can't find it.
spouse.interaction.procreate.fail.hasbab: We already have a baby... you didn't lose it did you?!
...you lost baby Joby didn't you? Wait... was his name Joby?
spouse.interaction.procreate.fail.lostba: Did you loose our baby?!? Oh, he is right here, silly.
Our neighbours found our baby. Please be more careful.
That is the last time I search for our baby!
spouse.interaction.procreate.fail.lowhea: Spend more time with me! I'm not ready for a child.
Hmm...not just yet. I think we need to spend more time together first.
interaction.adopt.success: That's my happiest day of my life!
armor.enabled: Okay, I will always wear my armor. If I have any.
armor.disabled: Fine, I will only wear my armor in case we are under attack.
profession.set.none: Alright, I will find myself a job soon.
profession.set.guard: I am honored to serve as a guard protecting this village.
profession.set.archer: I will join the defense of the village as an archer.
adult.gift.cake.success/1: Co to je? Dort? ach... ach můj. I.... musím najít svého manžela.
adult.gift.cake.success/2: Dort! Jak pozorné! I.... Počkat, co je to za divný pocit?
adult.gift.cake.success/3: Konečně něco, co pomůže mému manželství...
adult.gift.cake.fail/1: Myslím, že už nechci dort, ale díky.
gift.confectionary.fail/1: I don't have much of a sweet tooth
gift.confectionary.fail/2: I'm sure the baker would like this better.
gift.confectionary.best/2: This is just what I needed!
child.gift.confectionary.fail: Mommy said I can't have any sweets...
gift.gluten.fail: There is gluten in it! Do you want me to have diarrhea for the rest of the year?
gift.meats.fail/2: You know that I hate meat!
gift.lactose.fail: Sorry, but I am lactose intolerant.
gift.flowers.good/2: I hope you didn't pick that from my garden
gift.fish.fail/2: This is strange even for you.
gift.fish.fail/3: A fish. You gave me. A fish. Why?
gift.fish.good/1: This will save me some time. Thank you.
gift.fish.better: Wow. You spent all that time just for me?
gift.fish.best/2: This is just what I needed!
colors.fail: I'm blind. What am I supposed to do with this?
gift.weapons.fail/1: I don't think I can, sorry
gift.weapons.fail/3: You should speak to a guard.
gift.weapons.fail/4: I'm better with a hoe than with a sword
child.gift.weapons.success/2: Wait until %supporter% sees me with THIS!
gift.weapons.success/3: I will sharpen it well, adventurer.
gift.plant.fail/1: It's lovely, but I don't know what to do with it.
gift.plant.fail/2: Why don't you give this to the farmer?
gift.plant.best/2: This is just what I needed!
gift.plant.best/4: This will fit perfectly next to the shrubs.
adult.gift.fail/2: What made you think that I would like this?
adult.gift.fail/4: I don't want that, why would I?
adult.gift.fail/5: Why are you giving me that?
adult.gift.fail/6: Tohle má být dárek? Ne, děkuji.
adult.gift.better/1: Hej, to je docela v pohodě!
adult.gift.best/1: I.... Nevím, co na to říct. Mockrát děkuji, %1$s!
adult.gift.best/2: Jak jsi mohl... Nikdy jsem si to neuznal, to je úžasné!
adult.gift.best/4: To je fantastické! Dobře to využiju.
adult.gift.best/5: Mockrát děkuju. Budu si to pamatovat navždy.
child.gift.fail/3: Why did you bring me this? It's dumb!
child.gift.better/1: Awesome! I'm going to show this to all my friends.
child.gift.better/2: You found it! I lost this a few minutes ago.
child.gift.better/3: My friend stole one of these from me. Did you beat him up for me?
child.gift.best/2: Finally! My friend will stop bragging now.
child.gift.best/3: Wow! Where did you get this thing?
child.gift.best/4: My Dad has one of these. Now I have one too!
spouse.gift.fail/2: Um, is this supposed to be a gift for me?
spouse.gift.fail/3: Throw away your own junk! Oh, this was a gift?...sorry.
spouse.gift.fail/4: I thought you knew me better than that. I hate these.
spouse.gift.good/2: Ah! You're too good to me.
spouse.gift.good/3: This is unexpected, thank you, dear!
spouse.gift.better/1: Oh wow, this is actually really nice!
spouse.gift.better/4: You got this for me? How sweet!
spouse.gift.best/2: You are *way* too good to me!
spouse.gift.best/3: This must have been extremely expensive! Thank you!
spouse.gift.best/4: I...can't believe you'd get me something so thoughtful!
childp.gift.fail/2: Fuj, už jsem se tolik zlepšil!
childp.gift.fail/3: Nedala jsi mi to jako loni?
childp.gift.fail/4: Mohl bych to dostat tak snadno, ne díky.
childp.gift.good/3: Tohle je mnohem lepší než ten poslední dárek, co jsem dostal!
childp.gift.good/4: Woo hoo! Je moje, celá moje!
childp.gift.better/3: Tenhle se mi vážně líbí, můžu si ovát další?
childp.gift.better/4: Všichni mí přátelé teď budou žárlit!
childp.gift.better/5: To je tak super! Chtěl jsem to už věčnost!
childp.gift.best/2: Věděl jsem, že mi jeden z nich sežeš. Prostě jsem to věděl!
childp.gift.best/3: Yay! Mám nejlepší rodiče na světě!
childp.gift.best/4: To je tak úžasné! Nemůžu uvěřit, že je to všechno moje!
childp.gift.best/5: Mockrát děkuju! Jsi nejlepší ze všech!
spouse.endmarriage/1: I've had it. You don't treat me well enough. I'm leaving you!
spouse.endmarriage/2: I'm leaving. Forever! Don't look for me.
spouse.endmarriage/3: I'm sorry - I thought we could work things out, but it's not working for me. Goodbye.
spouse.endmarriage/4: %1$s, this is goodbye. Don't try to follow me.
adult.dialogue.main/4: What's going on with you today?
spouse.dialogue.main/1: Hi honey, where have you been?
spouse.dialogue.main/2: Hello dear, how is your day going?
spouse.dialogue.main/4: Hey %1$s! You look hungry. Would you like me to cook something?
adult.dialogue.hug.success/3: At least one thing made my day today.
adult.dialogue.hug.success/4: You're as snuggly as a sheep!
adult.dialogue.hug.fail/1: You're covered in soot and mud!
adult.dialogue.hug.fail/4: After you called me a dinosaur last week? No.
adult.dialogue.hug.fail/5: Quite frankly, you don't deserve a hug after you did that.
spouse.dialogue.hug.success/1: I love being entangled in your arms!
spouse.dialogue.hug.success/3: Would you rather only being able to hug or kiss?
spouse.dialogue.hug.fail/1: Why don't you go hug your ex?
childp.dialogue.hug.success/2: I'm going to be as strong as you are one day!
childp.dialogue.hug.success/4: I love hugs! You're soft and warm!
childp.dialogue.hug.fail/2: Přestaň s tím! Nechci, aby to lidi viděli!
childp.dialogue.hug.fail/4: Nechte mě na pokoji nebo mi dejte nějaké sušenky!
adult.dialogue.kiss.success/1: I wish this moment would last forever.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.success/1: I fall in love all over again when our lips meet!
spouse.dialogue.kiss.success/2: Time stops ticking when I'm with you.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.success/5: I wouldn't trade you for anyone in the world!
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/1: Not where someone can see us...
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/2: We don't have to if you don't want to.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/3: Your breath smells like wolf kibble.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/4: Go take a drink from the lake.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/5: Now that we're married I can tell you how lousy you are at kissing.
adult.dialogue.chat.success/1: Chlape, sušenky a mléko teď zní skvěle.
adult.dialogue.chat.success/2: Ano, myslím, že počasí je dnes pěkné.
adult.dialogue.chat.success/3: Daří se mi dobře! Ale když jsem se probudila, trefila jsem se do ksichtu.
adult.dialogue.chat.success/5: Mým snem je vybudovat si vlastní vesnici, ale jsem tak líný.
adult.dialogue.chat.success/6: Myslím, že jsem viděl %Supporter% v diamantovém brnění.
adult.dialogue.chat.success/7: Můj přítel %Supporter% mi řekl, že včera našli truhlu plnou diamantů!
adult.dialogue.chat.fail/2: Nevěřím, že to vybuchlo samo od sebe.
adult.dialogue.chat.fail/5: Měli by tě hodit do žaláře!
child.dialogue.chat.success/1: I heard stories about you! Are you a hero?
child.dialogue.chat.success/2: Ahoj. Chtěl jsem jít vylézt na střechu.
child.dialogue.chat.success/3: Chceš se mnou jít něco spálit?
child.dialogue.chat.success/4: Budu lovec jako ty a zabiju spoustu věcí!
child.dialogue.chat.success/5: Ahoj! Co děláš dneska? Jdu si zaplavat!
child.dialogue.chat.fail/1: Jestli mi nedáš sušenky, zadržím dech.
child.dialogue.chat.fail/2: Moji rodiče říkali, že s tebou nemáme mluvit, že jsi špatný.
child.dialogue.chat.fail/4: No jo? No, já ti vyhoním vejce do domu!
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/1: Uklidil jsem celý dům. Jak ses dnes měl?
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/2: Zlato, někdy poveštveme. Nezní to jako zábava?
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/3: Takže dnes jsem viděl pavouka. Bylo to obrovské, tak jsem utekla.
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/4: Měli bychom spolu postavit nový dům!
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/5: Málem jsem vešel do lávové jámy. To by nebylo dobré!
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/1: Vím, že nejsme nejchudší rodina, ale...
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/2: Jsem rád s tebou, ale potřebuju trochu prostoru.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/3: Někdy si přeju, abych měl vlastní "jeskyni", abych unikl tobě a všem.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/4: Jdi pryč, nemám na to náladu.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/5: Kde jsi byl? Vídáš se s někým za mými zády?
childp.dialogue.chat.success/1: Oh, I was just going to go explorin' later.
childp.dialogue.chat.success/3: Hi, can you make me a cake?
childp.dialogue.chat.success/4: Can I have my own room away from our house? That would be cool!
childp.dialogue.chat.success/5: Let's move into a cave! That sounds so fun!
childp.dialogue.chat.fail/2: I don't think I'd like that very much.
childp.dialogue.chat.fail/3: Is that why I've heard so much about "divorce"? What does that mean?
childp.dialogue.chat.fail/5: I don't want a baby sister.
adult.dialogue.story.success/1: Really? I can't believe that all happened!
adult.dialogue.story.success/2: I wish I was brave enough to take on a creeper.
adult.dialogue.story.success/3: That was a really good story! Is it original?
adult.dialogue.story.success/4: All of that happened yesterday? No way!
adult.dialogue.story.success/5: I was near there yesterday, I can't believe I didn't hear this already.
adult.dialogue.story.success/6: Haha! That definitely sounds like %Supporter%! Such an awesome person.
adult.dialogue.story.success/7: I've heard the Legend of %Supporter% almost a million times. Tell me again!
adult.dialogue.story.fail/1: *Ahem* That's my mother you're talking about.
adult.dialogue.story.fail/2: This is why the village talks about you.
adult.dialogue.story.fail/4: You're terrible! Creepers have feelings too!
adult.dialogue.story.fail/5: How could you kill a poor sheep?!
child.dialogue.story.success/2: Až vyrostu, chci být jako ty. Pšt, neříkej to tátovi.
child.dialogue.story.success/4: Šel jsem rybařit a málem jsem se utopil.
child.dialogue.story.success/5: Znamená to, že si můžu vzít, co chci? Chci říct, "půjčit si?"
child.dialogue.story.fail/2: Řeknu mámě, co jsi o ní řekl...
child.dialogue.story.fail/3: Myslím, že mluvíš o mém dědovi...
child.dialogue.story.fail/4: Nejsi nic jiného než vystrašený kocour, jak říkal táta!
child.dialogue.story.fail/5: Jak jsi mohl zabít neboho kuře?
spouse.dialogue.story.success/2: You were so rebellious! I love it!
spouse.dialogue.story.success/3: Did you ever tell your parents about losing their rings?
spouse.dialogue.story.success/4: It was that moment when I fell in love with you!
spouse.dialogue.story.success/5: Wow, you're the best hunter ever!
spouse.dialogue.story.fail/1: Talk to me when you kill something other than a harmless cow.
spouse.dialogue.story.fail/3: You have a family to think about!
spouse.dialogue.story.fail/4: ...If you liked them why didn't you marry them, instead?
spouse.dialogue.story.fail/5: Why did you wear the pink fluffy underwear? Whose were they?
childp.dialogue.story.success/1: What!? You really did that?! But...what happened to your friend?
childp.dialogue.story.success/2: I want to explore a cave, too! Let's go!
childp.dialogue.story.success/3: One day I'll kill more creepers than you!
childp.dialogue.story.success/4: Oh, oh, oh! Can we climb a tree, too?!
childp.dialogue.story.fail/1: I don't want to hear about grandma.
childp.dialogue.story.fail/2: You always say that. I just want a pet.
childp.dialogue.story.fail/3: You're just fibbing. I don't belive that.
childp.dialogue.story.fail/4: You said you didn't eat the cake and cookies...
childp.dialogue.story.fail/5: Someone said you were a bad person, and I believe them!
adult.dialogue.flirt.success/2: Oh, you! Stop being so cute!
adult.dialogue.flirt.success/5: That was so adorable! You had me at "hello"!
adult.dialogue.flirt.fail/1: If you mean that, then prove it.
adult.dialogue.flirt.fail/2: Aw.... Wait, you told the baker the same thing!
adult.dialogue.flirt.fail/5: A zombie has a better chance than you.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.success/1: *Blushes* Well, how about we do something like that, then!
spouse.dialogue.flirt.success/2: Aw, you said that when we first met.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.fail/2: This one is getting old... like you.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.fail/3: We're married, we don't have to do this anymore.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.fail/4: Talk to the tree, it cares more.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.fail/5: Yeah, yeah... What was it you were saying?
dialogue.joke.skeleton.failed: Skeletons are sentient beings! How dare you!
dialogue.joke.sheep.success/1: Unfortunate for the sheep to lose its wool, but funny!
dialogue.joke.sheep.success/2: Then the wolf fell in love with the sheep.
dialogue.joke.sheep.failed/1: That poor sheep! That's not funny at all!
dialogue.joke.creative.success/3: To je to nejlepší, co jsem kdy slyšel!
child.dialogue.joke.creative.success/3: Jsi ten nejzábavnější člověk na světě!
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.success/1: Vzala jsem si tě pro tvůj humor!
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.success/2: Příště bys po něm měl hodit vejce!
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.success/4: Tady je jeden pro tebe... Kolik kuřat vybouchne creeper?

spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/4: Musíš si to vymazat z hlavy.

childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/1: I thought you were funny, though...
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/2: I like knock knock jokes better.
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/3: I don't get it, that was dumb.
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/4: *Yawn* My friend's dad is cooler and funnier than you.
dialogue.greet.greet_0: Hey! How are you doing today?
dialogue.greet.getBetter/1: Aww, I hope whatever you're dealing with gets better

adult.shake_hand.fail/1: Seriously? After you slaughtered the cow?
adult.shake_hand.fail/3: I'm not a stranger, you don't have to be so polite.
adult.shake_hand.fail/4: Wow really? This isn't like you.
child.shake_hand.success/1: Ahoj! Někdo, koho znám, tě má rád... Někdo, koho znám, tě má rád. Někdo, koho znám, tě má rád...
child.shake_hand.success/2: Táta říkal, že je to moc hezká věc.
child.shake_hand.success/3: Teď si vyšumíme! Dole dole... Příliš pomalu!
child.shake_hand.success/5: Právě jsem vyčistil krávu touhle rukou.
child.shake_hand.fail/2: Mami, tati! Ta osoba se mě snaží unést!
child.shake_hand.fail/4: Fuj, na tvé ruce jsou černé věci.
child.shake_hand.fail/5: Potřesu ti rukou, jen když mi dáš diamant.
spouse.shake_hand.success/2: Naše ruce do sebe perfektně zapadají.
spouse.shake_hand.success/3: One day people will forget to shake hands.
spouse.shake_hand.success/4: Naše děti budou muset být tak zdvořilé.
spouse.shake_hand.success/5: *Stále si potřásá rukou * Řekni mi, kdy přestat!
spouse.shake_hand.fail/1: shake_hand? How about a kiss, instead?
spouse.shake_hand.fail/3: Tvoje ruka je ošklivá, v žádném případě.
spouse.shake_hand.fail/5: Proč si nepožádáš slušnou práci místo toho, abys mi potřásl rukou?
childp.shake_hand.success/1: Why do I need to learn this stuff?
childp.shake_hand.success/2: I heard that this is a polite thing to do.
childp.shake_hand.success/3: I'm gonna be just like you when I grow up!
childp.shake_hand.success/5: I don't get it, but okay!
childp.shake_hand.fail/4: I'll shake your hand if you give me cake.
childp.shake_hand.fail/5: No, you'll slip and hit me.
dialogue.divorce: Do you really want a divorce? A cleric can provide divorce papers to decrease penalties.
dialogue.procreate: Do you really want a child?
dialogue.adopt: Do you really want to be my parent?
dialogue.divorcePapers: Here you go, bring these papers to your spouse to confirm the divorce.
